cookingMethod: heat oil in a pan
fry onion until brown
add garlic and ginger
add beef and cook until browned
add tomato and spices
cook for 10-15 minutes
garnish with coriander leaves
marinate chicken with yogurt and spices
heat ghee in a pan
fry onion until brown
add garlic and ginger
add chicken and cook for a few minutes
layer rice and chicken in a pot
seal with dough and cook on low heat for 45 minutes
serve with raita
mix rice flour with water to make a dough
make small balls and flatten them
fill with coconut and jaggery mixture
fold and seal the edges
steam for 10-15 minutes
serve hot
season pork with salt
dredge in flour
dip in beaten egg
coat in panko breadcrumbs
heat oil in a pan
fry pork until golden brown
serve with tonkatsu sauce and shredded cabbage
cook sushi rice and let it cool
cut tuna, avocado, cucumber, and carrot into thin strips
place nori sheet on a sushi mat
spread rice over the nori
place tuna, avocado, cucumber, and carrot on top of the rice
roll tightly using the mat
cut into bite-sized pieces
serve with soy sauce and wasabi
shred cabbage and mix with flour, egg, and water to make a batter
heat a griddle and cook bacon until crispy
pour the batter over the bacon
add more bacon on top
flip and cook until both sides are golden brown
drizzle with mayonnaise and okonomiyaki sauce
sprinkle with bonito flakes and dried seaweed
serve hot
preheat oven to 450Â°F
roll out pizza dough on a floured surface
spread tomato sauce on top of the dough
add mozzarella cheese
bake in the oven for 10-12 minutes
add basil leaves on top
serve hot
cook spaghetti in a pot of boiling salted water
fry bacon in a pan until crispy
whisk eggs and Parmesan cheese in a bowl
add cooked spaghetti to the pan with bacon
pour the egg mixture over the spaghetti
toss to combine
add black pepper to taste
serve hot
mix espresso and Marsala wine in a shallow dish
dip ladyfingers into the espresso mixture
arrange the ladyfingers in a layer in a square dish
mix mascarpone cheese, egg yolks, and sugar in a bowl
beat egg whites until stiff peaks form
fold the egg whites into the mascarpone mixture
spread half of the mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers
repeat with another layer of ladyfingers and mascarpone mixture
dust the top with cocoa powder
refrigerate for at least 2 hours
serve cold
marinate chicken in yogurt and spices
cook chicken in a pan
make the sauce with butter, onion, garlic, ginger, and tomato puree
add cream to the sauce
mix chicken and sauce
serve hot
blanch spinach leaves and blend into a puree
cook paneer in a pan
make the sauce with onion, garlic, ginger, and tomato
add the spinach puree to the sauce
add spices and paneer to the sauce
serve hot
cook chickpeas in a pressure cooker
make the sauce with onion, garlic, ginger, and tomatoes
add spices to the sauce
add chickpeas to the sauce
cook for a few minutes
serve hot

ingredients: vegetables (carrot, cucumber, spinach, bean sprouts, mushrooms)
cookingMethod: cook rice
prepare and sautÃ© vegetables
grill or sautÃ© beef
fry an egg
assemble the dish with rice, vegetables, beef, and egg
serve with gochujang sauce
cook rice
chop bacon, onion, and garlic
heat a pan with sesame oil
cook bacon, onion, and garlic in the pan
add kimchi to the pan
add rice to the pan and stir
add soy sauce to the pan and stir
serve hot
soak and cook sweet potato noodles
prepare and sautÃ© vegetables and beef separately
combine noodles, vegetables, and beef in a pan
add soy sauce and sesame oil to the pan and stir
serve hot
boil spaghetti in salted water
cook pancetta or bacon in a pan until crispy
whisk together egg yolks, grated parmesan cheese, and black pepper
drain cooked spaghetti and add it to the pan with the pancetta or bacon
turn off the heat and pour in the egg mixture
stir quickly to coat the spaghetti with the sauce
serve hot
preheat oven to 450Â°F
roll out pizza dough and transfer it to a baking sheet
spread tomato sauce over the dough
sprinkle grated mozzarella cheese over the tomato sauce
bake for 10-12 minutes, until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted
remove from the oven and sprinkle chopped fresh basil on top
serve hot
mix espresso coffee and marsala wine in a bowl
dip ladyfingers in the coffee mixture and arrange them in a dish
beat egg yolks and sugar in a bowl until pale and creamy
add mascarpone cheese to the bowl and mix well
spread the mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers in the dish
sift cocoa powder over the top of the mascarpone layer
chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours
serve cold
